statements: SELECT * FROM design_files;
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM design_files WHERE access_level = 'restricted';
SELECT file_name, access_level FROM design_files ORDER BY file_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM design_files WHERE access_level = 'confidential' ORDER BY file_name;
SELECT id, file_content FROM design_files WHERE file_type = 'pdf';
SELECT * FROM design_files WHERE access_level = 'restricted';
SELECT id, file_name FROM design_files WHERE access_level = 'confidential';
SELECT * FROM design_files WHERE access_level = 'classified' ORDER BY file_name DESC;
SELECT id, file_type, file_content FROM design_files WHERE file_name LIKE '%draft%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM design_files WHERE access_level = 'classified';
SELECT * FROM design_files WHERE id = 1;
SELECT file_name, file_content FROM design_files WHERE access_level = 'public';
SELECT id, file_name, file_content FROM design_files WHERE file_name LIKE '%design%';
SELECT * FROM intellectual_property WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, property_name FROM intellectual_property ORDER BY property_name DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_content FROM design_files WHERE access_level = 'public'
SELECT * FROM intellectual_property WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY property_name DESC
SELECT id, property_name, owner_name FROM intellectual_property WHERE property_description LIKE '%confidential%'
SELECT id, file_name FROM design_files WHERE access_level = 'private' AND file_content IS NOT NULL
SELECT property_name, owner_name, property_description FROM intellectual_property ORDER BY owner_name ASC
SELECT * FROM sensitive_design_files;
SELECT file_name, creator FROM sensitive_design_files WHERE permission_level = 'Admin';
SELECT ip_name, ip_owner FROM intellectual_property ORDER BY ip_owner ASC;
SELECT file_id, creator, creation_date FROM sensitive_design_files WHERE permission_level = 'Read-Only';
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE file_id = 1 AND user_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_design_files;
SELECT file_id, file_name, creator FROM sensitive_design_files WHERE permission_level='admin';
SELECT ip_name, ip_type FROM intellectual_property ORDER BY ip_name DESC;
SELECT ip_owner, COUNT(*) AS num_files FROM intellectual_property GROUP BY ip_owner HAVING num_files > 1;
SELECT file_name, grant_date FROM sensitive_design_files JOIN access_control ON sensitive_design_files.file_id = access_control.file_id WHERE access_level='read';
SELECT * FROM design_files WHERE file_type = 'JPEG';
SELECT file_id, file_name FROM design_files WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM design_files WHERE access_level = 'public' ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.user_id WHERE permission_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM design_files WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM design_files WHERE file_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT file_name, file_size, access_level FROM design_files WHERE access_level != 'private';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_id = 3);
SELECT * FROM design_files WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT id, file_name, created_at FROM design_files WHERE file_type = 'PDF';
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM design_files WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT id, name, email FROM users WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM design_files;
SELECT file_name, file_type, owner_id FROM design_files WHERE id > 5;
SELECT users.name, design_files.file_name, access_logs.access_time FROM users JOIN access_logs ON users.id = access_logs.user_id JOIN design_files ON access_logs.file_id = design_files.id;
SELECT file_name, created_at FROM design_files WHERE owner_id = 10 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT users.name AS user_name, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role = roles.id WHERE roles.role_name = 'admin';
